html: It has been an honor and a pleasure to have served alongside Congressman Loebsack and I look forward to working with him throughout the rest of his term to improve the lives of all Iowans.
text: It has been an honor and a pleasure to have served alongside Congressman Loebsack and I look forward to working with him throughout the rest of his term to improve the lives of all Iowans.

html: Whether he was fighting to lift Iowans out of poverty, supporting our rural communities, or ensuring every Iowan had access to quality, affordable health care, Congressman Loebsack’s commitment to public service has been an inspiration to many, including myself.
text: Whether he was fighting to lift Iowans out of poverty, supporting our rural communities, or ensuring every Iowan had access to quality, affordable health care, Congressman Loebsack’s commitment to public service has been an inspiration to many, including myself.

html: I promised Iowans I would hold Washington accountable. When I found out the USDA had authorized programs to help Nebraska farmers but not Iowa, I wanted answers. I called on the USDA to immediately authorize programs to assist Iowa farmers impacted by the historic flood.
text: I promised Iowans I would hold Washington accountable. When I found out the USDA had authorized programs to help Nebraska farmers but not Iowa, I wanted answers. I called on the USDA to immediately authorize programs to assist Iowa farmers impacted by the historic flood.

html: I'm very disappointed the Senate failed to pass a disaster funding bill. We can't turn our backs on our communities when they're recovering from the devastating damage of natural disasters. That’s not who we are as Iowans, and that’s not who we are as Americans.
text: I'm very disappointed the Senate failed to pass a disaster funding bill. We can't turn our backs on our communities when they're recovering from the devastating damage of natural disasters. That’s not who we are as Iowans, and that’s not who we are as Americans.

html: I have never been more proud to call myself an Iowan than after seeing how our communities have come together to help one another recover from this devastating flood. html: The ACA isn’t perfect. But overturning protections for Iowans with pre-existing conditions, reinstating life-time caps and going back to a time when insurers could charge women more is not the answer.
text: The ACA isn’t perfect. But overturning protections for Iowans with pre-existing conditions, reinstating life-time caps and going back to a time when insurers could charge women more is not the answer.

html: Iowa can't afford another government shutdown. Joined @KCCINews to discuss my bill to end all shutdowns. Under my bill, if Congress and the President fail to reach a budget deal, the government stays open, but lawmakers don't get paid. It's time to hold Washington accountable.pic.twitter.com/sc1KM84X8v
text: Iowa can't afford another government shutdown. Joined @KCCINews to discuss my bill to end all shutdowns. Under my bill, if Congress and the President fail to reach a budget deal, the government stays open, but lawmakers don't get paid. It's time to hold Washington accountable.pic.twitter.com/sc1KM84X8v

html: Iowans are feeling the very real impact of this shutdown. Right now in our own backyard, small business owners are suffering, farmers are struggling to provide for their families and agencies tasked with keeping us safe are understaffed and unpaid. It's time to end this shutdown.
text: Iowans are feeling the very real impact of this shutdown. Right now in our own backyard, small business owners are suffering, farmers are struggling to provide for their families and agencies tasked with keeping us safe are understaffed and unpaid. It's time to end this shutdown.

html: I will support measures that effectively strengthen our border security, but I want to make sure we spend taxpayer dollars wisely, while also keeping our government fully open and operational.
text: I will support measures that effectively strengthen our border security, but I want to make sure we spend taxpayer dollars wisely, while also keeping our government fully open and operational.

html: That's why I voted for over a billion dollars in funding for more border patrol agents, drones, e-sensors, and other innovative technologies that can better secure our borders and protect our communities.
text: That's why I voted for over a billion dollars in funding for more border patrol agents, drones, e-sensors, and other innovative technologies that can better secure our borders and protect our communities.
